item.stained-lenses.attachement_pouch.de: Stores Modules and Lenses inside, can be accessed through the Spyglass Inventory
item.stained-lenses.default_lens.desc: Manufactured by ClearView Inc, this lens offers clear vision and is strictly not endorsed for any unauthorized modifications
item.stained-lenses.marked_lens.desc: Marks seen mobs, making them take more damage from the user
item.stained-lenses.entity_lens.desc: Highlights mobs through walls, revealing their hidden presence
item.stained-lenses.ethereal_lens.desc: Enables Ethereal Sight, showing hidden blocks
item.stained-lenses.focal_lens.desc: Charges in sunlight to unleash beams of concentrated light, destroying anything in its path
item.stained-lenses.focal_lens.desc_use: - Hold [%s] while using the Spyglass to collect charge and unleash a powerful beam.
item.stained-lenses.sulfur_sight_lens.de: See the world in eerie green hues, as if viewed through a creeper's eyes
Experience reality warp in strange ways, akin to an enderman's unsettling perspective
item.stained-lenses.silk_sight_lens.desc: View multiple perspectives simultaneously, like a spider's multifaceted vision
tooltip.stained-lenses.zoom_wheel.desc: Adjustable zoom levels for precise viewing
tooltip.stained-lenses.distance_measurer: Displays the distance to the targeted block or entity
tooltip.stained-lenses.proximity_spotter: Highlights nearby entities within a certain range
tooltip.stained-lenses.vibration_silence: Blocks the vibrations that the Spyglass creates when it's used
block.stained-lenses.ethereal_block.desc: A block that is only visible with Ethereal Sight
